name: Tini - Shopping Template
description:
Hi, welcome to Tini Shopping Template. This template is built using the Tini Design System of Tiki. We are also building a Tini App solution where you can build and publish app(s) on Tiki platfotm.


Template includes:

  • UI screens for each OS (Android & iOS)
  • Flows


If you have questions or suggestions you can reach out to us on the Tini Design community


V1.3.0

Changelog

1 - Apply Tini design system’s new Section component.

2 - Re-structure and re-apply the components for easy management:

  • Add Section and Modal components.
  • Re-organize Content components.

3 - Re-structure the Flow page.

4 - Add Vietnamese language.


V1.2.1

Changelog

Apply new Design Tokens from Tini Design system 2.0


V1.2.0

Changelog

1 - Home, Search, Categories

  • Add scrolling behaviors
  • Add different cases of category’s quantity

2 - Use transparent Navigation bar with only navigation box for all screens that use overlay.

3 - Add Product listing screens

4 - My account:

  • Add cover image.


V1.1.0

Changelog

1 - Change Main version of Home screen.

2 - Rework Purchase Product flow.

  • Add to cart CTA change from Icon only button to Text only button.
  • Move Cart entry point from Bottom Bar to Navigation Bar (Header).

3 - Fix the error when changing variants of Bottom Bar.

4 - Remove Bottom bar in child screens (Category details)

5 - Change sample images.


v1.0.0 - Initial release

Features:

  • Browse, Search product
  • Filter, Sort product
  • Purchase product
  • Account management
